item.title: Morgan Stanley says this solar stock is a 'key beneficiary of tariffs over the long term'
item.description: First Solar will have some near-term exposure to Trump's taxes on imports, but the company could benefit over the long term.

item.title: Quality, long-term stocks to buy during the sell-off, according to UBS
item.description: CNBC Pro subscribers can see 10 stocks that appeared on UBS' list to clients.

item.title: How 20% declines in stocks came to be known as 'bear markets' on Wall Street
item.description: The definition of exactly what constitutes a bear market can depend on who you ask.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades Levi's, says apparel maker is at an 'early innings inflection'
item.description: Analyst Matthew Boss upgraded the denim and apparel maker to overweight from neutral.

item.title: Resilient cybersecurity stocks to navigate the market turmoil and compelling tech opportunities
item.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.
